metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37369 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Qt before 5.15.15, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.x through 6.5.x before 6.5.2, there can be an application crash in QXmlStreamReader via a crafted XML string that triggers a situation in which a prefix is greater than a length.

criterions.comment: qt4-x11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtbase-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
